com.jalapeno
Interface ExtentManager

public interface ExtentManager

Provides interface to manage database extent and perfrom such operations as kill extent, rebuild indices and populate extent with test data.

Method Summary

Method Detail

populate

int populate(java.lang.Object aClass,
             int numInstances)
             throws java.lang.Exception
Creates randomly populated instances of the given class in the database.

Parameters:
aClass - Class to populate.
numInstances - A number of instances to create. Actual number may be less because of uniqueness constraints.
Returns:
The number of actually created instances.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

killExtent

boolean killExtent(java.lang.Object aClass)
                   throws java.lang.Exception
Delete all instances of the class (and its subclasses) from the database.

Parameters:
aClass - Class instances of which to delete.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception

rebuildIndices

void rebuildIndices(java.lang.Class aClass)
                    throws java.lang.Exception
Rebuilds all entries for each index that originate in the class.

Parameters:
aClass - Class that originated database extent.
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - in case indices could not be successfully rebuilt.
